segments.text: My eyes are drawn to the two children, busy with their own plans.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy is precariously balanced on a two-step stool, reaching into the cookie jar.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I notice the stool's legs are splayed, making it look quite unstable.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He's got one hand inside the jar and the other holding a plate to catch his loot.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl stands nearby, her arm raised expectantly towards the jar.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She's clearly waiting for her share of the cookies.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: They're working together, a tiny conspiracy unfolding right there.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Their faces are so focused on the prize, completely ignoring the overflowing sink.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can almost hear their whispered planning, their secret mission.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's quite a clever little scheme they've got going.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: They must think they're being incredibly stealthy.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Itâ€™s amusing how oblivious the woman is to their escapade.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope they don't get caught with their hands in the cookie jar.
segments.speaker: PAR
